name: NATIONAL ADULT DAY SERVICES ASSOCIATION (NADSA)
description: Professional association representing adult day servcies providers
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Affordable Care Act Repeal/Replace; Medicare/Medicaid coverage for Adult Day Services.
Oppose reduction of Non-Defense Discretion funding that impacts CDBG, CSBG, and OAA funding. Oppose reductions in Medicaid funding.
Veteran access to Home and Community Based Services (HCBS), specifically Adult Day Services.
Affordable Care Act Repeal/Replace; Medicare/Medicaid coverage for Adult Day Services.
